meanings.sent1: The pepperer sprinkled some pepper on the salad.
meanings.sent2: The pepperer at the restaurant always has a pepper shaker handy.
meanings.sent3: The pepperer accidentally spilled pepper all over the table!
meanings.sent4: She was a true pepperer, adding just the right amount of spice to every dish.
meanings.sent5: The pepperer's job is to make sure every meal has a hint of pepper flavor.
